text: Bebi: Baby Games for Preschool Fun ABC learning for Kids 2 + Free Â· InâApp Purchases Â· Designed for iPad Empower your preschool toddler to learn and have fun playing 500+ educational games, from drawing, coloring and phonics to math, shapes and music. With Baby Games for Preschool by Bebi, you can support and encourage your toddler to learn unsupervised while having a fun in a 100% ad free, safe environment. Baby Games for Preschool keeps your toddler occupied and away from video streaming apps by offering 500+ different educational activities, puzzles and games. Itâs free to install, so why not download today and start enriching your toddlerâs education? What can 2,3,4 or even 5 year olds learn? âºThe alphabet, phonics, numbers, words, tracing, shapes, patterns and colors âº Basic math and science through games and activities âº How to recognise and look after animals âº All about food and healthy eating âº Music, instruments and singing âº Art skills through coloring, drawing and doodling âº Problem solving, dexterity and much, much moreâ¦ For kindergarten kids, play is an integral part of their development. Toddlers enjoy playing casual games, but Baby Games for Preschool encourages them to learn and absorb valuable information through interactivity and fun. Similarly, learning from books and papers is not easy at a kindergarten or preschool age. Let your toddler relax with fun and educational games: their absorbent brain will soak up all the new knowledge on its own, allowing you as a parent to relax safe in the knowledge that their screen time is positive and rewarding. Once you notice that your toddler is engaged playing our educational games, you will see that the learning process has begun. Whether its popping balloons, discovering science, developing the inner artist or simply learning songs through music, you might even find yourself enjoying a few of the appâs games and activities. Why Baby Games for Preschool? âº Our 500+ learning games provide a safe and useful device experience for your 2-4 year old toddler âº Developed and tested by child development experts âº Designed for safety and convenience with no supervision needed âº Parental Gate - code protected sections so that your child doesnât accidentally change settings or make unwanted purchases âº All settings and outbound links are protected and only accessible for adults âº Available offline and playable without an internet connection âº Timely hints so your child doesn't feel frustrated or lost in the app âº 100 % Ad free with no annoying interruptions Who says learning can't be fun?
